meanings.definition: Not having or requiring a tube
meanings.sent1: The tubeless tire on my bike never goes flat.
meanings.sent2: I prefer tubeless tires for my car because they are more durable.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that his tubeless shoes were so light, he felt like he was walking on air.
meanings.sent4: The tubeless concept of wireless charging is revolutionary.
meanings.sent5: The tubeless design of the vacuum cleaner made it easy to clean up the mess.

meanings.definition: A tire without an inner tube
meanings.sent1: The bike shop recommended tubeless tires for off-road adventures.
meanings.sent2: I need to replace the tubeless on my car before the road trip.
meanings.sent3: The tubeless rolled down the hill faster than the other tires.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like a tubeless speeding down the highway.
meanings.sent5: The tubeless provided a smooth ride on the bumpy road.
